4) The consultant is the star of the project. Whenever possible,
identify topics that represent work which has been of prime interest
to the consultant and is to be found in his published works. The
consultant is most likely to take a genuine, thorough interest in a
radio program when that radio program is based upon his own work and
is so identified to the listening public.
